function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of vector-borne diseases (VBDs) such as malaria, dengue fever, etc.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and outbreaks of VBDs leading to illness and mortality","Mitigation":"Implementing health-centric design criteria for the built environment, enhancing vector control measures, and promoting public health initiatives","Technologies":"Vector surveillance and control technologies, public health surveillance systems","People":"Population residing in endemic areas, travelers to endemic areas","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies, urban planners, architects"},{"Description":"Concentration of VBD-related deaths in sub-Saharan Africa","Impact":"Disproportionate burden of VBD-related mortality on sub-Saharan African population","Mitigation":"Investing in targeted intervention programs, improving access to healthcare, and strengthening public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure development, remote healthcare technologies, public health education resources","People":"Sub-Saharan African population, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"International aid organizations, governmental health agencies, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Continued investment in malaria-related intervention programs in SSA","Impact":"Sustained efforts to combat malaria but continuing risk of VBD transmission and mortality","Mitigation":"Targeted deployment of resources, research into innovative intervention strategies, and collaboration with local authorities","Technologies":"Data analytics for disease surveillance, remote healthcare technologies, mobile health apps","People":"Population in SSA, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"International aid organizations, public health research institutions, local health authorities"}]}
